title: Ocean week 2016 reward - Received the wrong one?
body:
Hi,

Just wondering why I received a skin when I am still to unlock all the champs (I have 3 6300 champs to go)?

Thanks

replies.body:
Hi there!

The reward Mystery Champion works the same way as if you were buying it from the store - you can only buy a Mystery Champion [when available] if there are ten champions you don't own over 450IP. Because of this, you would have received a Mystery Skin instead.

[See some earlier posts on this.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/the-news-hour/skdtu9Lh-enlist-in-ocean-week?comment=000e0000)

that seems to make sense... id much rather a champ i don't have being that I'm going to grind for most of them now seeing as i have around 7 left my issue is by having more content I've obviously either spent more money or time on the game and then i get something in my eyes worth nothing i got all hyped up for a let down.

Yeah,

I dont get the support ticket system... What should I put it under?

Hmm I mean you could argue it's a good thing since you got paid content instead of free content :P But if you're concerned put in a support ticket about it is your best bet. 

It could be that they gave skins to people with 3 or less champs left to unlock to cover those who hadn't bought Jhin yet or something, but I couldn't say for sure.
